get_ghst_quick_alert: あなたは、このリンクをクリックすることでそれを理解し、受け入れることになります、Pixelcraft Sudios Pte. 販売に関連したサービスの取引または提供を促進してはなりません デジタル決済トークンまたはデジタル資産(本サービス) の交換、仲介または保管について そして、訪問者がQuickswapによって提供されるデジタル資産交換サービスを訪問することを可能にする技術的なサービスを提供しています。 すべてのサービスは、Quickswapによって直接お客様に提供され、かかるサービスに関するお客様の契約上の権利および義務は、Quickswapに直接反するものとします

 が延長されます。

realm_index_own_gotchiverse: ゴッチバースの一部を所有します
realm_index_own_gotchiverse_p1: The first auction takes place completely within the Gotchi Citaadel with all available parcels populating the West/Northwest area.
realm_index_own_gotchiverse_p2: The Citaadel offers the safest farming destination in all of the Gotchiverse. No menacing Lickquidators are allowed and Aavegotchis are able to farm and play in peace!
realm_index_own_gotchiverse_p3: Everyone in the Gotchiverse knows, the Citaadel is primo real estate.
realm_index_what_is_alchemica_p1:
FUD, FOMO, ALPHA and KEK are the four elemental building blocks of the Gotchiverse. You'll need combinations of them to craft
 various NFTs such as Installations for your REALM parcels.
realm_index_what_is_alchemica_p2: They're also ERC20 tokens, which means you can farm and trade them on the open market!
realm_index_discover_alchemica: Discover how much alchemica is in your parcel
realm_index_revolutionary_nft: a revolutionary new way of doing NFT drops, where everyone wins.
realm_index_bid_to_earn_how_to_1: Place a bid. If you get outbid, your bid will be REFUNDED, plus an additional PAYOUT, up to 10% of the original bid amount
realm_index_bid_to_earn_how_to_2: Continue bidding until the timer runs out. If a bid is placed near the end of the auction, the Auction timer will be extended
realm_index_bid_to_earn_how_to_3: After the Auction has finished, the highest bidder can CLAIM their NFT from the “Rewards” page.
realm_check_spelling: Please check spelling or try different filters.
realm_ghst_earned: Total GHST earned from getting outbid.
realm_ghst_sent_to_wallet: This GHST is sent automatically to your connected wallet
realm_get_bidding: Go to the Auction page and get bidding!
realm_go_to_auction: Go to the Auction page and get bidding to either win a piece of the metaverse or earn some GHST!
realm_unfortunately_no_win: Unfortunately you didn't win anything in the auction.
realm_faq_realm_is: The Gotchiverse REALM is an action role playing game being developed by Pixelcraft Studios and running on the Ethereum-compatible Polygon blockchain. The game mixes elements of real-time strategy and sandbox farming with playable NFTs to deliver what has been described as an entirely new game genre: 'DeFi MMORPG'. In The Gotchiverse, players are able to farm completely new ERC20 tokens, craft exclusive NFTs, organize into guilds, explore the sprawling world and much more.
realm_faq_where_dive_deeper: Where can I dive deeper into the game’s lore and rules?
realm_faq_publiushed_in_june: was published in June of this year and is an enjoyable read.
realm_faq_parcel_desc: Each REALM parcel is its own ERC721 NFT that represents a specific land plot in The Gotchiverse. Players can farm Alchemica directly from each parcel and equip “Installation” NFTs on top of the parcels for more farming, defense and social structures.
realm_faq_variety_of_parcels: What variety of parcels are available?
realm_faq_parcel_sizes_explained: There are 3 main sizes of REALM parcels: humble (8x8); reasonably-sized (16x16); and spacious (32x64). In addition, a total of only 69 “Paartner Parcels” (64x64) also exist. Paartner Parcels are reserved for special experiences developed in tandem with partnering teams and not available in the auction.
realm_faq_smol_deposits: Contains smol deposits of Alchemica and building space
realm_faq_reasonable_deposits: Contains reasonable deposits of Alchemica and building space
realm_faq_huge_deposits: Contains huge deposits of Alchemica and building space
realm_faq_what_is_total_supply: What is the total supply of REALM parcels?
realm_faq_total_supply_is: 420,069 REALM are scheduled to be minted over the entire game’s lifecycle. This is designed to play out in three distinct acts over five years.
realm_faq_act_1_desc: Act I includes all the entirety of the gameplay map revealed to date. That map shows two distinct zones, The Citaadel and everything else is The Grid. The Citaadel is made of a total 55,014 REALM and The Grid has the remaining 100,055 REALM.
realm_faq_act_1_desc_2: That means only 155,069 REALM can be minted until ACT II begins in 2024. Notably, this also puts a hard cap on the amount of Alchemica available to be farmed through the first few years.
realm_faq_act_2_desc: Think of it as a sequel with REALM and Alchemica tokenomics already allocated for.
realm_faq_act_3_desc: The final allotment of REALM and Alchemica will only be available when the world is ready for the final act!
realm_faq_no_presale: No, there is no presale of REALM parcels. Auction #1 is the very first distribution of REALM.
realm_faq_is_there_raffle: Is there a raffle as well?
realm_faq_yes_raffle: Yes! In an effort to achieve as fair a distribution as possible, an additional 4,000 REALM will be raffled to GHST stakers in the week following Auction #1, bringing the total of the first distribution to a total 20,000 REALM.
realm_faq_use_drop_tickets_to_participat: Use Aavegotchi Drop Tickets to participate in the raffle and good luck!
realm_faq_2nd_and_3rd_raffle: The second and third auction/raffles are scheduled before the end of year with similar rates but in different locations of The Citaadel. *NOTE: the original litepaper suggested parcels from The Grid would be available in Auction 2 and 3. That is NOT the case. It makes more sense to focus on the Citaadel and all of its variety of opportunities before revealing The Grid.
realm_faq_how_much_parcel_cost: How much do REALM Parcels cost?
realm_faq_parcel_cost_desc: There are no minimum bids and there are no fixed prices. Price discovery happens on the open market with most secondary trading happening at the Aavegotchi Baazaar NFT Marketplace. To explore: visit Aavegotchi.com click 'Play' and then choose 'Baazaar'.
realm_faq_gotchus_alchemica: Gotchus Alchemica is the collective name of the four new ERC20 tokens that are farmed by playing The Gotchiverse (FUD, FOMO, ALPHA, KEK).
realm_faq_gotchus_alchemica_2: These four new tokens make up the core materials of The Gotchiverse. Various mixes of the four are required to craft all sorts of NFTs exclusive to gameplay and aesthetics alike. Whether you need to mint a new Installation for your parcel or craft a rare collectible NFT, you’ll be inputting a concoction of Alchemica to produce it.
realm_faq_how_much_alchemica_in_parcel: How do I know how much Alchemica is in a particular parcel?
realm_faq_how_much_alchemica_in_parcel_d: The exact amount of Alchemica inside any given parcel will only be revealed once the game goes live. At that time, you will be able to engage “The Aaltar” and the Chainlink VRF (random number generator) will determine your parcel’s balances at that time. The Chainlink VRF takes a number of inputs into consideration. The size of a parcel will determine the floor and ceiling of what is possible for any given parcel’s Alchemica deposits. Your “roll of the dice” will fall somewhere on the spectrum within those limits for each of the four Alchemica. You will never receive zero allotment of any Alchemica. The auction dashboard also highlights each parcel’s “Alchemica Boosts”. This is important, because each boost represents a guaranteed “serving” of that particular token, in effect raising your parcel’s potential floor amount. These boosts will be allocated to your parcel regardless and in addition to whatever the Chainlink VRF delivers to your parcel once the game begins.
realm_faq_boost_determined: Alchemica boosts are determined by each parcel’s proximity to natural deposits of FOMO, FUD, ALPHA, and KEK around the game’s surface area.
realm_faq_boost_example: For example, if your parcel is next to or adjacent to a red river of FOMO, you will be receiving a FOMO boost. This guarantees a base amount of FOMO will be available for your parcel in addition to whatever amounts Chainlink VRF determines.
realm_faq_which_parcels_auctioned: Which REALM parcels are being auctioned off?
realm_faq_parcels_auctioned: The first auction takes place completely within The Citaadel with all available parcels populating the West/Northwest area.
realm_faq_parcels_auctioned_2: The Citaadel offers the safest farming destination in all of the Gotchiverse. No menacing Lickquidators are allowed and Aavegotchis are able to farm and play in peace! Everyone in the Gotchiverse knows the Citaadel is primo real estate.
realm_faq_auction_time_1: The REALM Parcel auction will happen over a 72 hour period, beginning on October 28, 2PM UTC and ending on October 31, 2PM UTC.
realm_faq_auction_time_2: Some Auctions may be extended due to “hammer time”, which extends an Auction by twenty minutes if a bid is placed near the end.
realm_faq_auction_time_3: Join us October 28, 2pm UTC — October 31, 2pm UTC
realm_faq_what_is_required: What is required for me to be able to participate?
realm_faq_only_prereq: The only prerequisite is a nice bag of
realm_faq_how_many_parcels_auctioned: How many parcels are being auctioned?
realm_faq_how_many_parcels_auctioned_des: REALM Land Parcel Auction #1 will feature 16,000 parcels within the Citaadel, the stronkhold of Aavegotchis within the Gotchiverse.
Each Parcel will be its own independent Auction, with no set minimum or maximum price. This updated table ( Timeline V1.1) shows the roadmap for major events:
realm_faq_what_is_distribution_plan: What is the REALM Parcels distribution plan long term?
realm_faq_distribution_plan: This table illustrates the roadmap for distributing all REALM inside of The Citaadel.
realm_faq_grid_parcels_desc: REALM parcels on The Grid will be released only after The Citaadel has gone live. More details on their release schedule will be announced near the end of year. The total supply of REALM parcels on The Grid is confirmed to have a total 100,055 REALM parcels.
realm_faq_what_are_3_word_addresses: What are these 3 Word Addresses I see on each parcel?
realm_faq_what_are_3_word_addresses_desc: Each parcel enjoys its own unique arrangement of three words for an address. Instead of a boring string of numbers, your REALM parcel is very easy to remember and search for. Type any address word in the search box to filter specifically for parcels that have the word or words you’re looking for.
realm_faq_can_people_snipe_bids: Can people snipe my top bids in the final moments of the auction?
realm_faq_can_people_snipe_bids_desc: No. This is thanks to a feature called hammer time. All auctions are initially scheduled to conclude at 2pm UTC on Halloween Sunday. However, any auction that has a new top bid entered in the final 20 minutes will see a 20 minute extension added to the auction’s length, known as hammer time. This prevents any last minute swoops and bots hate it too. Everyone has an opportunity to give a final bid. There is no limit on hammer time, so it’s entirely possible a bidding war can lead to hours of back and forth top bids before the final auctions conclude.
realm_faq_what_if_no_gotchi: But what if I don’t own an Aavegotchi?
realm_faq_what_if_no_gotchi_desc_1: Don’t worry! There are many reasons you still want to own Gotchiverse REALM:
realm_faq_what_if_no_gotchi_desc_2: The gotchiverse introduces 4 new tokens (FOMO, FUD, ALPHA and KEK) collectively known as Alchemica. Alchemica can ONLY be minted by parcel owners.
realm_faq_what_if_no_gotchi_desc_3: You can rent your farmland to other players and split the farmed Alchemica earned.
realm_faq_what_if_no_gotchi_desc_4: You can use those Alchemica to craft all sorts of exclusive NFTs.
realm_faq_what_if_no_gotchi_desc_5: You may have an opportunity to sell your parcel to guilds and expanding “estates” that want to acquire your parcel.
realm_faq_what_if_no_gotchi_desc_6: All of these actions can be taken regardless of owning an Aavegotchi. Finally, you can always flip your parcels on any open market as well. These are ERC721 NFTs after all!
realm_faq_cannot_find_answer: Cannot find the answer to your question? You can always ask in our frenly
realm_faq_cannot_find_answer_2: and someone will be able to help.
realm_about_boosts_1: Alchemica boosts are determined by each parcel’s proximity to natural deposits of FOMO, FUD, ALPHA, and KEK around the game’s surface area.
realm_about_boosts_2: For example, if your parcel is next to or adjacent to a red river of FOMO, you will be receiving a FOMO boost. This guarantees a base amount of FOMO will be available for your parcel in addition to whatever amounts Chainlink VRF determines.
